form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, 157

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/2/2023 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS Tegucigalpa, D.C. FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION May 13, 1987 CITY COUNTRY At juest of th. merican Consul at Tegucigalpa, D.C. Honduras, C.A. NAME AGE SEX Isabel Orellana de Munoz 80 Fem. I certify that on the above date I examined WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON 239460 Tegucigalpa, Hond. 3/7/86 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class-A, B, or C-diagnosis, and pertinent details*): X-Ray plate # 18025, May 13-1987, is negative. Chest X-ray report Federico Baltodano M. from Dr. V.D.R.L.: Negative Juan Jos√© Molina Blood serological report from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) 01/08/09 DR. EVA Mark Permit from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT Eva Mannheim de Gome z, M.D. Medical Examiner May 13,1987 50157-102 *Continue on reverse side if necessary. OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Rev. 5-78) GPO : 1986 O - 498-798 Dept. of State
